title: Magnus Walker
description:
Magnus Walker is one of the most well-known people in the automotive space. From jeans to Porshe 911s, he likes to modify things in unexpected ways. This is obvious whether you're watching his breakthrough video, "Urban Outlaw", or looking at his large collection of colorful cars. His new show on Hagerty's YouTube channel is called "The Next Big Thing", which focuses on underdog cars that are cool, interesting, and affordable. 

IG: @magnuswalker

Watch the Next Big Thing: https://www.youtube.com/user/HagertyKnowsClassics

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Zack Klapman, Matt Farah, Magnus Walker)
